sen.j: 足利 周嵩（あしかが しゅうこう）は、戦国時代 (日本)の僧侶。
sen.e: Shuko ASHIKAGA was a priest who lived in the Sengoku period (period of warring states).
Shuko ASHIKAGA was a priest who lived during the Sengoku period (period of warring states).
Shuko ASHIKAGA was a priest who lived during the Sengoku Period (Period of Warring States).
sen.cmt: 表記を統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 足利将軍家の一族で、足利義輝、足利義昭の実弟である。
sen.e: He was a member of the Ashikaga Shogun family and a brother of Yoshiteru AHIKAGA and Yoshiaki ASHIKAGA.
He was a member of the Ashikaga Shogun family and a brother of Yoshiteru AHIKAGA and Yoshiaki ASHIKAGA.
He was a member of the Ashikaga Shogun family and a biological brother of Yoshiteru AHIKAGA and Yoshiaki ASHIKAGA.
sen.cmt: 統一リストをもとに補足しました。

sen.j: 室町幕府の第12代将軍・足利義晴の末子として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as the youngest child of Yoshiharu ASHIKAGA who was the 12th Shogun of Muromachi bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).
He was born as the youngest child of Yoshiharu ASHIKAGA, who was the twelfth Shogun of the Muromachi Bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).
He was born as the youngest child of Yoshiharu ASHIKAGA, who was the 12th Shogun of the Muromachi Bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).
sen.cmt: アラビア数字にしました。

sen.j: 幼い頃から仏門に入り、鹿苑寺（金閣寺）の院主になった。
sen.e: He entered the Buddhist priesthood in his young days and became Inju (the chief of a temple) of the Rokuon-ji Temple (Kinkaku-ji Temple).
Shuko entered the Buddhist priesthood in his younger days and became the Inju (the chief of a temple) of the Rokuon-ji Temple (Kinkaku-ji Temple).
He entered the Buddhist priesthood in his younger days and became the Inju (the chief of a temple) of the Rokuon-ji Temple (also known as Kinkaku-ji Temple).

sen.j: 永禄7年（1565年）5月19日、松永久秀・松永久通父子と三好三人衆によって兄で第13代将軍だった義輝が殺害された。
sen.e: On July 7, 1564, his brother Yoshiteru, the 13th Shogun, was killed by Hisahide MATSUNAGA, his son Hisamichi MATSUNAGA and miyoshi sanninshu (three chief retainers of the Miyoshi clan).
sen.cmt: 永禄7年は1564年なので、(1565年)は誤記と判断しました。一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: On July 7, 1564, Shuko's brother Yoshiteru, the thirteenth Shogun, was killed by Hisahide MATSUNAGA and his son, Hisamichi MATSUNAGA, and the Miyoshi Sanninshu (three chief retainers of the Miyoshi clan).
On July 7, 1564, his brother Yoshiteru, the 13th Shogun, was killed by Hisahide MATSUNAGA and his son, Hisamichi MATSUNAGA, and the Miyoshi Sanninshu (three chief retainers of the Miyoshi clan).

sen.j: その後、周嵩は逃亡しようとしたが捕捉されて殺害された。
sen.e: After that, Shuko tried to escape but was captured and killed.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Although Shuko tried to escape, he was ultimately captured and executed.
